mapper.select: select no,name,contents,password,date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') as regTime from guestbook order by reg_date desc
select no,name,contents,password,reg_date as regTime from guestbook where no < #{no } order by no desc limit 0,3
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no = #{no } and password = #{password }
